name: Dinari BRRR
description: The Dinari BRRR dShares token (BRRR.d) represents 1:1 ownership of shares in the CoinShares Valkyrie Bitcoin ETF (BRRR), which provides investors regulated exposure to Bitcoin via the CME CF Bitcoin Reference Rate-New York Variant. Each BRRR.d token is fully backed by a corresponding BRRR ETF share securely held in a transparent and auditable treasury. By leveraging blockchain technology, BRRR.d enables fractional ownership, 24/7 trading, instant settlement, and enhanced liquidity, making it easier for investors to gain exposure to Bitcoin through a regulated and convenient vehicle.
